attributes.review: This was a the WORST app I have ever used!😡. It was so hard to use. I hate it. 😤 very difficult to focus when I see a racist on my screen!!!! I don’t like how the app is set up. 😑. The quality is bad and the photos are even worse🥶. I will never use this app again and I hope no one else does either🙏. Anyways...stream Happy by Dixie 🧚🏼‍♂️❤️
attributes.title: Racist Pig

attributes.title: 野

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to look at the rally schedules to figure out when i shall download my tickets 🎫, and never show up.. 
but i opened the app to a gif of cheeto man posing naked in the mirror. i immediately started to gag 🤢 as i saw his orange saggy- i’ll leave it there.

..anyways, i shut off my phone bcuz my eyes felt like acid was poured into them. i tried to blindly👩‍🦯 get to the bathroom  to rinse my eyes 👀 but i ended up dunking my head in the toilet 🚽 instead of the sink. after my e.r experience for new eyeballs, i walked back into my room to see the nakey  cheeto man 👨 standing in front of my bed.   i was about to run and hide but he jumped on his nyan cat 🐈 and zoomed 🏃‍♂️out the window. as i peed and pooped and cried, i rolled around on the floor. and i’ve never seen him since. but i now take 11 hours a day of therapy due to this real nightmare

a solid -♾/10 because of all the glitches
attributes.title: gave me 10+hours a day of therapy

attributes.review: This app has giving me trauma,depression, and ptsd. I downloaded this app and I seen something very disturbing. I seen a big orange Cheeto looking monster. Chile I was so afraid. Ever since I seen that I’ve had so many mental problems. I eventually needed therapy . Please delete this app, I don’t want anyone to experience this aswell 😩. This is why you should never support trump. NICKI 2020 😋✨🦄
attributes.title: NICKI 2020 🦄

attributes.review: I opened the app to see what a campaign in the 21st century would look like, moving into the digital age, it is a fantastic idea and it reaches a large base of people. Unfortunately Big Cheeto completely destroys this line of logic with his bigoted, racist, and homophobic remarks. It tears my heart to think that this gremlin represents the whole United States and her people. An absolute atrocity to the 21st century and to the modern man.
attributes.title: Hate Speech

attributes.review: when i opened this app i could not believe my eyes 🙈🙈🙈🙈. a walking cheeto? seriously? seeing that made my fish drown and he could not be revived. as a lifeguard i am so disgusted by the actions of this app!!! making my fish drown? ridiculous. this app must be taken down before other innocent fishes lose their lives in this battle with the app.
attributes.title: this app MUST BE REMOVED!!!
